name: 2D Racer
description:
Game build for game development course at the university technology college (UTC),

This game will be used to introduce and teach students about the practical and theoretical sides of games development using unity game engine.

Students will have to fix elements of the game build and also add to its content by developing their own scripts and graphics.

Game development tutors Leading the course project:

Phi Dinh: http://phidinh.com/

Stephen Cunningham: http://www.stephencunninghamcgartist.com/

Game development course at UTC media city:

http://www.utcmediacityuk.org.uk/interactive-media-and-gaming-units/
